name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Itachi Uchiha Sharingan Live Wallpaper Animation

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring Itachi’s Sharingan to life! Download now for stunning live wallpapers and a powerful Naruto-inspired new tab experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the world of Naruto with the Itachi Uchiha Sharingan Live Wallpaper extension! Every new tab brings the intense power of Itachi’s Sharingan to your browser, with high-quality animated wallpapers that capture the essence of his mysterious and formidable character.

Key Features:
Stunning Sharingan Wallpaper: Enjoy vibrant, animated backgrounds featuring Itachi Uchiha and his iconic Sharingan.
Clock & Date Display: Stay organized with an integrated clock and date layout that fits perfectly with the Naruto theme.
Quick Access Links: Navigate to your favorite sites quickly with easy, customizable shortcuts.
Additional Options: Explore more extensions, read the privacy policy, or uninstall effortlessly.

Perfect for Naruto and Itachi Uchiha fans, this extension brings his iconic powers to your browser in style.

Download now and experience the Sharingan every time you open a new tab!
